item.title: [317] Making a Donor Shop [317]
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

[quote=“Xillion, post:3, topic:327463”][quote author=Rixxx link=topic=423849.msg3112675#msg3112675 date=1264671063]
Just spawn the shop npc at a donator zone.
[/quote]Really bad idea, I ran a server in 2008 with an admin shop, people just noclipped their way there with cheat clients.

Even if he has the UID stuff, people can walk there. Blocking off the area with objects? Not going to work, they can just log out and log in and quickly click in the area before the objects come up.[/quote]

That’s why you add a check to your store, so only admins can open it…

if (playerRights >= 2)
{
//Open up shop code here…
}

Seriously, it’s not hard at all…

Read full topic
